law.catch_line: In this subtitle the following words have the meanings indicated....

text.section: In this subtitle the following words have the meanings indicated.
"Advisory Committee" means the Advisory Committee on the Registration of Rehabilitation Practitioners.
"Registration" means the authorization of a rehabilitation practitioner to provide vocational rehabilitation services.

section.section: "Rehabilitation practitioner" means an individual who provides vocational rehabilitation services.

"Rehabilitation practitioner" includes:
a nurse certified by the State Board of Nursing as a nurse case manager;
a rehabilitation counselor; and
a vocational evaluator.

text.section: "State Department of Education, Division of Rehabilitation Services" means the State agency designated to administer the public vocational rehabilitation services program.
"Vocational rehabilitation services" has the meaning stated in § 9-670 of this title.
